raw_text: FERNANDOPULLE – MERCIA (Bubby) – nee PULLENAYEGAM,​ Beloved wife of late Michael Fernandopulle,​ much loved mother of Malcolm,​ Aloma,​ Mohan,​ Honorine and Darrel,​ mother-in-law of Quintus Fernando,​ Diane,​ Mohan Asbury and Karen,​ darling grandmother of Radhika and Melissa,​ Niroshini and Nishani,​ Gerald,​ Michelle and Gillian,​ Sureka and Natasha,​ Keishia and Nigel. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 3 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 23rd August. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 4.00 p.m. on Thursday,​ 24th August for burial at General Cemetery Borella. (R.C. Section).052702
